name: errorlens
description: Improve highlighting of errors, warnings and other language diagnostics.

errorLens.errorBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing errors.

errorLens.errorForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing errors.

errorLens.warningBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing warnings.

errorLens.warningForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing warnings.

errorLens.infoBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing info.

errorLens.infoForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing info.

errorLens.hintBackground.description: Background color used to highlight lines containing hints.

errorLens.hintForeground.description: Text color used to highlight lines containing hints.

errorLens.fontStyle.description: Show ErrorLens annotations in Italics, or not?

errorLens.fontWeight.description: Specifies the font weight for ErrorLens annotations.

errorLens.margin.description: Distance between end of the code line, and the start of the ErrorLens annotation. (CSS units).

errorLens.enabledDiagnosticLevels.description: Specify which diagnostic levels are enhanced. e.g. [ 'error', 'warning' ]. Valid values are any or all of: 'error', 'warning', 'info' & 'hint'

errorLens.addAnnotationTextPrefixes.description: If 'true', prefixes the diagnostic severity ('Error:', 'Warning:' etc) to ErrorLens annotations.

errorLens.exclude.description: Specify messages that should not be highlighted.

errorLens.light.description: Specify color of decorations for when the light color theme is active.

errorGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to error gutter icon for light themes.

warningGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to warning gutter icon for light themes.

infoGutterIconPath.description: Absolute path to info gutter icon for light themes.

errorGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Error color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

warningGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Warning color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

infoGutterIconColor.markdownDescription: Info color of `circle` gutter icon set for light themes.

errorLens.clearDecorations.markdownDescription: Works only when `delay` is set. When set to `true` extension clears all decorations at the time when diagnostic changes (but it could cause flickering if the delay is < 500). When set to `false` - decorations are not cleared and delay applied to clearing decorations also (but that causes messages being on screen even if the problem was solved).

errorLens.onSave.description: If `true` - update decorations only on save.

errorLens.gutterIconsEnabled.description: If `true` - show error/warning/info icons in the gutter (In place of debug breakpoint icon).

enumDescriptions: Should be similar to vscode icons in Problems Panel.
